channel.title: How to know if your server is online
channel.description:
Probably going to get deleted, or I'm going to get banned for this or something, but anyways.
For the people wanting to know if they're server is online, and can't figure it out.
Here is a site to test it, just simply type in your server ip and port, and click "Get Status"!
http://status.blackout-gaming.net/

item.title: How to know if your server is online
item.dc:creator: @pistolpete332 pistolpete332
item.description:
@pistolpete332 wrote:

This is a way to see if your IP is accepting connections from a port with your server.

Read full topic
item.source: How to know if your server is online

item.title: How to know if your server is online
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“sjustin1996, post:4, topic:376054”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=471989.msg3451719#msg3451719 date=1293789736]

Your an idiot. Your server is online when you run it.

/thread

Hypocrisy at it’s finest
[/quote]

^ what he said

EDIT: By the way, wrong section, if there is one. I would say this would go in the “tutorials” section, but this is not worthy of being named a tutorial, so this should simply be removed completely.[/quote]

You don’t even fucking know me; Gtfo off moparscape you troll.

Read full topic
item.source: How to know if your server is online

item.title: How to know if your server is online
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Clawz, wanna not be a twat?
This is to help the people saying “how can I know if my server is online.”
If you aren’t going to help, keep the flaming to yourself, and go play outside.
Kthxbai.

Read full topic

item.title: How to know if your server is online
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:376054”]Your an idiot. Your server is online when you run it.

/thread[/quote]
I think what he meant was, check if the port is open for that IP, not “If server is on”.

Read full topic
